mapper.select: select * from mb_attr_type where ATTR_KEY = #{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COLUMN_STATUS !='W'
select ATTR_DESC from mb_attr_type where ATTR_KEY = #{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update mb_attr_type
ATTR_DESC = #{attrDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTR_CLASS = #{attrClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_METHOD = #{useMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALUE_METHOD = #{valueMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SET_VALUE_FLAG = #{setValueFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_CATEGORY = #{busiCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ATTR_KEY = #{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into mb_attr_type
ATTR_KEY,
ATTR_DESC,
ATTR_CLASS,
USE_METHOD,
VALUE_METHOD,
SET_VALUE_FLAG,
BUSI_CATEGORY,
STATUS,
COMPANY,
#{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attrDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attrClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{useMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{valueMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{setValueFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{busiCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select VALUE_METHOD from mb_attr_type where ATTR_KEY = #{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select USE_METHOD from mb_attr_type where ATTR_KEY = #{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
ATTR_CLASS pk_value, ATTR_CLASS || ' ' || ATTR_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
ATTR_CLASS pk_value,concat(ATTR_CLASS,' ',ATTR_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM MB_ATTR_CLASS where PARENT_ATTR_CLASS = #{parentAttrClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
ATTR_KEY pk_value, ATTR_KEY || ' ' || ATTR_DESC pk_desc
ATTR_KEY pk_value,concat(ATTR_KEY,' ',ATTR_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_attr_type where VALUE_METHOD = 'VL' OR VALUE_METHOD = 'RF'

select
ATTR_KEY pk_value, ATTR_KEY || ' ' || ATTR_DESC pk_desc
ATTR_KEY pk_value,concat(ATTR_KEY,' ',ATTR_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_attr_type where USE_METHOD = 'DESC'
